0.text: Innate: Alistar generates a stack of Triumph for each enemy  champion he  stuns or  displaces with his abilities, and each time a nearby enemy  minion or non-epic  monster dies. He generates 7 stacks if a nearby enemy champion or epic monster dies.

0.text: Active: Alistar smashes the ground, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and  stunning and  knocking them up simultaneously for 1 second.

Unique â Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 â 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 â 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE â TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 â 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 â 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+5 ability power
+30 health
+25% base health regeneration
+ 2 per 10 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique â Spoils of War: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions below ( 50% / 30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique â Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Targon's Buckler, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE â SPOILS OF WAR: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to  execute minions below ( 50% /  30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill  gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique â Devotion: Grant you and allied champions within 850 units a shield for 180 â 330 (based on target's level) that decays over 2.5 seconds (90 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE â DEVOTION: Grant you and allied champions within  850 units a  shield for 180 â 330 (based on target's level) that decays over 2.5 seconds (90 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique â Consecrate: Grant allied champions (excluding yourself) within 850 units 3 bonus armor and 3 bonus magic resistance.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 2 bonus resistances for this item's passive effect, Consecrate.
passive.originText: UNIQUE â CONSECRATE: Grant allied champions (excluding yourself) within 850 units 3 bonus armor and 3 bonus magic resistance.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+400 health
+200% base health regeneration

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique â Pledge: Designate the target allied champion as being Worthy, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as Worthy by one Knight's Vow at a time (60 second cooldown; 1250 range).
active.originText: UNIQUE â PLEDGE: Designate the target allied champion as being Worthy, forming a  tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as Worthy by one Knight's Vow at a time (60 second cooldown;  1250 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique â Sacrifice: While your Worthy ally is tethered to you and you are above 30% of your maximum health, redirect 10% of the post-mitigation physical and magic damage they take to you as true damage and heal for 7% of the damage dealt by your Worthy ally to champions. If they are below 30% maximum health, the damage redirection is increased to 20%.
passive.originText: UNIQUE â SACRIFICE: While your Worthy ally is tethered to you and you are above 30% of your maximum health, redirect 10% of the post-mitigation physical and magic damage they take to you as true damage and  heal for 7% of the damage dealt by your Worthy ally to champions. If they are below 30% maximum health, the damage redirection is increased to 20%.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique â Conduit: Designate the target allied champion as the Accomplice, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown; 1250 range).
active.originText: UNIQUE â CONDUIT: Designate the target allied champion as the Accomplice, forming a  tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown;  1250 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique â Convergence: Immobilizing enemy champions marks them for 8 seconds. Your Accomplice's basic attacks on-hit and ability hits against marked enemies fire a missile at them that deals 30 â 70 (based on level) (+ 7.5% AP) (+ 1.5% maximum health) bonus magic damage upon arrival.
passive.originText: UNIQUE â CONVERGENCE:  Immobilizing enemy champions marks them for 8 seconds. stats.originHTML:
Stats

+500 health
+50 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique â Immolate: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 15 (+ 1.75% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within 325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, with the damage being increased by 25% against minions. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage. Damaging enemy champions or epic monsters with this effect grants a stack for 5 seconds that increases subsequent Immolate damage by 10%, stacking up to 6 times for a 60% increase.
passive.originText: UNIQUE â IMMOLATE: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 15 (+Â 1.75% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within  325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, with the damage being increased by 25% against minions. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage. Damaging enemy champions or epic monsters with this effect grants a stack for 5 seconds that increases subsequent Immolate damage by 10%, stacking up to 6 times for a 60% increase.
